str2: So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From zelos; to have warmth of feeling for or against.
From prophetes; to foretell events, divine, speak under inspiration, exercise the prophetic office.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To prevent, debar, hinder; with infin: from doing so and so. From the base of kolazo; to estop, i.e. Prevent.
A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
The tongue; by implication, a language.
